hero.descricao: I am a Full Stack developer, currently residing in São Paulo. I am 17 years old, with 3 years in the field, and I am a passionate programming and technology enthusiast.

About.title: About me
About.description: Let's talk a little about me.
About.question: And after all, who am I
About.about-me: I'm a Full Stack developer. I'm originally from Minas Gerais, but I currently live in São Paulo. And I work as a web developer. I'm 17 years old and I'm passionate about technology, already having 3 years in the area. When I'm not at home, I like being on the mats, I'm a jiu-jitsu athlete, varied in the area and I'm looking for new challenges.
